pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Parametric Estimation of Spatial Segregation in a Multivariate Point Process // Edge-corrected kernel density estimation and binary kernel regression estimation for multivariate spatial point process data. For details, see Diggle, P.J., Zheng, P. and Durr, P. A. (2005) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9876.2005.05373.x.
